{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# <b>hist</b>"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "The `hist` function allows histogram visualizing DataFrame data.  At a minimum, the `hist` function requires the following keywords:\n",
    "<ul>\n",
    "<li> `df`: a pandas DataFrame</li>\n",
    "<li> `x`: the name of the DataFrame column containing the x-axis data (except with 2D image data, then optional)</li>\n",
    "</ul>\n",
    "\n",
    "The y-axis will display the histogram counts for the specified data set.  \n",
    "\n",
    "Other optional keywords for this function are described in <a href=\"https://endangeredoxen.github.io/fivecentplots/keyword.html\">Keyword Arguments</a>."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Setup"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Imports"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "%load_ext autoreload\n",
    "%autoreload 2\n",
    "%matplotlib inline\n",
    "import fivecentplots as fcp\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import os, sys, pdb\n",
    "osjoin = os.path.join\n",
    "db = pdb.set_trace"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Sample data"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>Batch</th>\n",
       "      <th>Sample</th>\n",
       "      <th>Region</th>\n",
       "      <th>Value</th>\n",
       "      <th>ID</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <td>101</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "      <td>Alpha123</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.5</td>\n",
       "      <td>ID701223A</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1</th>\n",
       "      <td>101</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "      <td>Alpha123</td>\n",
       "      <td>2.1</td>\n",
       "      <td>ID7700-1222B</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>2</th>\n",
       "      <td>101</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "      <td>Alpha123</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.3</td>\n",
       "      <td>ID701223A</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>3</th>\n",
       "      <td>101</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "      <td>Alpha123</td>\n",
       "      <td>3.2</td>\n",
       "      <td>ID7700-1222B</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>4</th>\n",
       "      <td>101</td>\n",
       "      <td>1</td>\n",
       "      <td>Alpha123</td>\n",
       "      <td>4.0</td>\n",
       "      <td>ID701223A</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "   Batch  Sample    Region  Value            ID\n",
       "0    101       1  Alpha123    3.5     ID701223A\n",
       "1    101       1  Alpha123    2.1  ID7700-1222B\n",
       "2    101       1  Alpha123    3.3     ID701223A\n",
       "3    101       1  Alpha123    3.2  ID7700-1222B\n",
       "4    101       1  Alpha123    4.0     ID701223A"
      ]
     },
     "execution_count": 2,
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "execute_result"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df = pd.read_csv(osjoin(os.path.dirname(fcp.__file__), 'tests', 'fake_data_box.csv'))\n",
    "df.head()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Set theme"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "(Only needs to be run once)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 3,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "#fcp.set_theme('gray')\n",
    "#fcp.set_theme('white')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Other"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "SHOW = False"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Simple histogram"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Vertical bars"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "A simple histogram with default bin size of 20:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 473x481 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x='Value', show=SHOW)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Horizontal bars"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Same data as above but with histogram bars oriented horizontally:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 473x481 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x='Value', show=SHOW, horizontal=True)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Legend"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Add a legend:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 7,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 602.375x481 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x='Value', show=SHOW, legend='Region')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Kernal density estimator"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 617.375x481 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x='Value', show=SHOW, legend='Region', kde=True, kde_width=2)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Row/column plot"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Make multiple subplots with different row/column values:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 9,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 1052.38x931 with 9 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x='Value', show=SHOW, legend='Region', col='Batch', row='Sample', ax_size=[250, 250])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Wrap plot"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### By column values"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 712.375x671 with 4 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x='Value', show=SHOW, legend='Region', wrap='Batch', ax_size=[250, 250], horizontal=True) "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### By column names"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 11,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 959x331 with 3 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "df['Value*2'] = 2*df['Value']\n",
    "df['Value*3'] = 3*df['Value']\n",
    "fcp.hist(df=df, x=['Value', 'Value*2', 'Value*3'], wrap='x', show=SHOW, ncol=3, ax_size=[250, 250])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Images"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "<b>fivecentplots</b> ``hist`` plots can also be used for histograms of pixel values from images, with and without color plane separation"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### Mono\n",
    "Consider a light blue color patch.  First we ignore any CFA and just consider the blue color channel from the RGB image:"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "<img src=\"https://imgs.michaels.com/MAM/assets/1/D730994AF28E498A909A1002BBF38107/img/16F309E5F1CF4742B4AACD8E0CCF08E0/D203087S_1.jpg?fit=inside|1024:1024\" width=\"200\">"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>0</th>\n",
       "      <th>1</th>\n",
       "      <th>2</th>\n",
       "      <th>3</th>\n",
       "      <th>4</th>\n",
       "      <th>5</th>\n",
       "      <th>6</th>\n",
       "      <th>7</th>\n",

       "      <th>9</th>\n",

       "      <td>240</td>\n",
       "      <td>240</td>\n",
       "      <td>241</td>\n",
       "      <td>241</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1022</th>\n",
       "      <td>249</td>\n",

       "      <td>243</td>\n",
       "      <td>243</td>\n",
       "      <td>244</td>\n",
       "      <td>244</td>\n",
       "      <td>244</td>\n",
       "      <td>244</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>1023</th>\n",

       "</div>"

   ],
   "source": [
    "# Read an image and convert to raw using only the blue color channel\n",
    "import imageio\n",
    "url = 'https://imgs.michaels.com/MAM/assets/1/D730994AF28E498A909A1002BBF38107/img/16F309E5F1CF4742B4AACD8E0CCF08E0/D203087S_1.jpg?fit=inside|1024:1024'\n",
    "imgr = imageio.imread(url)\n",
    "img = fcp.utilities.rgb2bayer(imgr, 'bbbb')\n",
    "img"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 684.371x481 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(img, markers=False, ax_scale='logy', ax_size=[600, 400], line_width=2, show=SHOW)"
   ]
  },

   ],
   "source": [
    "img = fcp.utilities.rgb2bayer(imgr, 'rggb')\n",
    "img"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 15,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<Figure size 771.871x481 with 1 Axes>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fcp.hist(img, markers=False, ax_scale='logy', ax_size=[600, 400], show=SHOW, legend='Plane', cfa='rggb', line_width=2, colors=fcp.BAYER)"
   ]
  }
 ],
